english.segment1: Forty days with a heart like a stone. Forty nights feeling cold and alone. Like a stranger cause its been so long. Its not You but its me whos gone
english.segment2: Try to pray bow my head but life gets in the way. And I dont even know what to say
english.segment3: Somewhere in the middle You still shine in me. Somewhere in the middle of Your hands. Somewhere in the middle of Your plans. You make me complete
